children.text: When using arrow keys or WASD, move the player object relative to the camera X rotation, i.e. the ground direction of movement. Note the left/right controls actually do a strafe, moving at 90 degrees relative to the camera X rotation. Also the Custom Movement behavior is used to push the player back out of any solids after attempting movement in each direction, ensuring they cannot pass through any solid.
IN FIRST PERSON, TREAT TURN LEFT AND RIGHT THE SAME AS STRAFING
IN THIRD PERSON, IF USING MOUSE TO ROTATE CAMERA BUT NOT PLAYER (LEFT CLICK), ALSO TREAT TURN LEFT AND RIGHT THE SASME AS STRAFING
RESOLVE INPUTS AND UPDATE CUSTOM MOVEMENT
